name: Pliable, LLC Covid-19 Vaccine Site
address: The Edgewater Hotel | 2411 Alaskan Way, Seattle WA, 98121
vaccines: Janssen COVID-19 Vaccine, Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine
info:
**********************************************************************************************************************************************************
Hello! We warmly welcome you to Pliable’s mobile COVID-19 vaccination clinic at The Edgewater Hotel on Thursday June 17th, 2021.  
**********************************************************************************************************************************************************
This vaccination event is administering the Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 vaccine (1st or 2nd doses!). We also offer Johnson&Johnson COVID-19 vaccine (single-dose shot).
**********************************************************************************************************************************************************
Pfizer is a two-dose vaccination series, with doses ideally spaced 21 days apart. Although the second dose should be administered as close to the recommended interval as possible, it may be administered up to 42 days after the first dose or at a minimum interval of 17 days. If you have had your 1st dose elsewhere, please bring your CDC vaccination card with you to your 2nd-dose appointment. 

**********************************************************************************************************************************************************
Who is Pliable?
Pliable LLC is a nurse practitioner-led organization for mindfully-driven healthcare. In alignment with Washington State Department of Health’s (DOH) equitable COVID-19 vaccine distribution strategies, our goal is to equitably and compassionately serve those communities disproportionately impacted by COVID-19 and help fill in vaccine access gaps. 
**********************************************************************************************************************************************************
Fact Sheets and Resources
Please read the CDC and WA DOH information regarding COVID-19 Vaccinations and have your questions answered before registering. 
Resources can be found at: https://www.doh.wa.gov/Emergencies/COVID19/Vaccine https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/covid-19/info-by-product/pfizer/pfizer-bioNTech-faqs.html https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/covid-19/info-by-product/janssen/index.html
The American Academy of Pediatrics’ Pfizer Endorsement & Facts can be found at: https://www.aappublications.org/news/2021/05/12/cdc-aap-pfizer-covid-vaccine-teens-051221.
You/Legal Guardian should have accessed and read the EUA fact sheet prior to registering. 
The Fact Sheet for Pfizer vaccination can be found at: https://www.fda.gov/media/144414/download 
The Fact Sheet for Johnson and Johnson vaccination can be found at: https://www.fda.gov/media/146305/download
For resources on side effects and post vaccination expectations: https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/vaccines/expect/after.html
 **********************************************************************************************************************************************************

By proceeding for vaccination you are consenting to the following terms below as the patient or surrogate decision maker for the patient, including minors. 
• I certify that I am/my child is at least 12 years of age if I am selecting Pfizer, or 18+ if selecting Johnson & Johnson.
• I understand it is not possible to predict all possible side effects or complications associated with receiving the Pfizer COVID-19 or Johnson & Johnson vaccine. 
• I understand the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has authorized the emergency use of this vaccine, which is not an FDA approved vaccine in this patient population. I understand the nature, alternatives, benefits and risks of vaccination, to the extent they are known at this time. 
• I am encouraged to sign up with v-safe: https://vsafe.cdc.gov/ 
• I acknowledge that I have been advised to remain near the vaccination location for observation for 15 minutes after administration, 30 mins if I have a prior history of allergic reactions to vaccines. 
• I give my consent to Pliable LLC, including licensed employees, volunteers, and partners, to administer the Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 vaccine OR Johnson&Johnson COVID-19 vaccine as described above. 
• I authorize and understand Pliable LLC may be required to or may voluntarily disclose my vaccine-related health information to my insurance plan, state or federal registries, and/or other public health authorities, for purposes of payment or health care operations. 
• I understand that I am not creating a patient relationship with Pliable LLC by participating in vaccination. I understand Pliable LLC is not acting as my medical provider. Vaccination does not replace treatment by my medical provider. I agree I will seek medical advice, care and treatment from a medical provider if I have questions or concerns, or if I experience side effects. 
• I have been provided expectations for the day of my vaccination.
• I acknowledge that I have read the vaccine Fact Sheet and agree to these terms and conditions.  
**********************************************************************************************************************************************************
Happy Vaccination Day!
www.bepliable.com  
**********************************************************************************************************************************************************
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Susan G Taylor CRNA Corp - COVID Vaccine CLinic
info:
Mobile Vaccine Clinic at North Fork Brewery. Walk-ins welcomed. 
After your vaccination, enjoy an on-the-house draft beer or root beer at the brewery! 
Vaccine is free and will also enter you into the
Washington State Lottery "Shot of a Lifetime" Million Dollar Drawing!
Offering Moderna first or second doses.  Bring your card for second doses.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Yakima County Health District COVID Vaccination Site
info: **1st DOSE PFIZER VACCINATIONS!!!!***!!!!VACUNAS DE PRIMERA DOSIS PFIZER!!! The vaccination clinic will take place at the grocery store, Su Mercado, in Grandview. Masks are required. Please wear clothing which allows access to your shoulder. Vaccinations at this site are reserved for people who live and/or work in Washington State. All individuals 12 and over are eligible to get vaccinated. Those under 18 must be accompanied by a parent/guardian or must get parental consent via video/phone call or paper format. La clínica de vacunación se llevará a cabo en la tienda Su Mercado en Grandview. Se requieren máscaras. Por favor, use ropa que permita acceso a su brazo. Las vacunas en este sitio están reservadas para las personas que viven o trabajan en el estado de Washington. Todas las personas mayores de 12 años son elegibles para vacunarse. Los menores de 18 años deben estar acompañados por un padre/tutor o deben obtener el consentimiento de los padres por video/llamada telefónica o en papel. ***1st DOSE PFIZER VACCINATIONS!!!!***!!!!VACUNAS DE PRIMERA DOSIS PFIZER!!!
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Thurston County Public Health Medical Reserve Corp
address: 625 Black Lake Blvd SW, Olympia  WA, 98512
info: This is a Johnson & Johnson mobile clinic being held at Capital Mall, 625 Black Lake Blvd SW, Olympia WA, 98502 for anyone age 18 and older from 12pm-8pm.  We will be located inside the mall, closest to the Sephora end of the mall and next to the Buckle store. Please bring a form of identification with you to your appointment - ID card, passport, or other document with your name and birthday on it. • Wear a short-sleeved shirt, but dress with layers, if needed. • Please arrive at your scheduled appointment time. • Waiting at least 15 minutes after vaccination is required.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Rebel Med NW - COVID Vaccine Clinic
address: 5401 Leary Ave NW STE 202, Seattle WA, 98107
info: ***We will accept both first and second dose appointments*** Insured, medicaid, medicare, and uninsured options all available. Walk-in's welcome, but will be advised to fill out information via this same sign up via kiosk. We are administering the first/second dose of the Moderna vaccine. Moderna is currently approved for all adults 18 years and older. Please bring a face covering that covers the mouth and nose. Everyone is required to stay 15-30 minutes under observation after receiving the vaccine. ****Rebel Med NW is located on the 2nd floor, with the entrance on NW Vernon Place above the nail salon. Across the street from the Olympic Athletic Club. ~~~We are an integrative medical clinic specializing in Naturopathic Primary Care, Acupuncture, and Mind Body Medicine.~~~ Please be respectful of the space as treatments may be ongoing. Please contact 206-297-6013, and ask to speak to a provider on call if you have a question, leave a voicemail and we will return as soon as we are available.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.
